title: Chassis Engineering: Chassis Design, Building & Tuning for High Performance Handling
features: In most forms of racing, cornering speed is the key to winning. On the street, precise and predictable handling is the key to high performance driving. However, the art and science of engineering a chassis can be difficult to comprehend, let alone apply.

explains the complex principles of suspension geometry and chassis design in terms the novice can easily understand and apply to any project. Hundreds of photos and illustrations illustrate what it takes to design, build, and tune the ultimate chassis for maximum cornering power on and off the track.
description: Chassis Engineering: Chassis Design, Building & Tuning for High Performance Handling.
